title: YARD / CUNO
description:
* All greeting except "Making amends".
* Throwing up advice.
* Buy pants.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""The fuck are you talking about?" H..."
dialogueTree.text: "The fuck are you talking about?" He throws another rock.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He's calling us f****ts, Cuno! He..."
links.text: "He's calling us f****ts, Cuno! He says we're fucking each other."

links.title: You: ""Kim, what should we do?""
links.text: "Kim, what should we do?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*We* shouldn't do anything. I don'..."
links.text: "*We* shouldn't do anything. I don't tempt such forces."

links.title: You: ""I see what you mean, but we've got..."
links.text: "I see what you mean, but we've got little choice here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just take it easy," he says with w..."
links.text: "Just take it easy," he says with what seems like excessive caution.

links.title: Rhetoric: "The language these kids are using....."
links.text: The language these kids are using... pure unfettered id. There will be no reasoning with those creatures.

links.title: You: ""What *forces*?""
links.text: "What *forces*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You will see.""
links.text: "You will see."

links.title: You: ""Are you kids siblings?""
links.text: "Are you kids siblings?"

links.title: You: ""You got a good hand, kid!""
links.text: "You got a good hand, kid!"

links.title: Cuno: ""What?! You wanna *fuck* Cuno now?""
links.text: "What?! You wanna *fuck* Cuno now?"

links.title: Authority: "It's just like back in school. Insu..."
links.text: It's just like back in school. Insults are weapons for bullies. Disarm him, make his weapons your own. Tell him you *do* wanna fuck him.

links.title: You: "I don't know, that sounds like a ri..."
links.text: I don't know, that sounds like a risky move -- saying that.

links.title: You: "Yeah, that's clever! They can't cal..."
links.text: Yeah, that's clever! They can't call me something if I'm already calling myself that.

links.title: Authority: "Exactly!"
links.text: Exactly!

links.title: You: ""Kid! You wanna hang out? I'm not a..."
links.text: "Kid! You wanna hang out? I'm not a narc."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck no! Cuno doesn't buy that shi..."
links.text: "Fuck no! Cuno doesn't buy that shit. Fucking entrapment shit."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Fast -- this kid has got street sma..."
links.text: Fast -- this kid has got street smarts.

links.title: You: ""Look, I have questions for you.""
links.text: "Look, I have questions for you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Alright." He juts his chin out. "E..."
links.text: "Alright." He juts his chin out. "Entertain the Cuno! Show me whatcha got. Whatcha got there? Whatcha got, huh?! Show me whatcha got!"

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The kid moves his hands like a bask..."
links.text: The kid moves his hands like a basketball player dribbling fast.

links.title: Logic: "Irregular speech patterns... overco..."
links.text: Irregular speech patterns... overconfidence... Could this kid be on drugs? This warrants further investigation into this... *Cuno*.

links.title: You: ""I don't have time for this." [Leav..."
links.text: "I don't have time for this." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I am looking for the Children of t..."
dialogueTree.text: "I am looking for the Children of the Big Sea. Would that be you?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno is the Big C, pig, and Cuno d..."
links.text: "Cuno is the Big C, pig, and Cuno doesn't have fucking diaper rats, does he?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know, does he?""
links.text: "I don't know, does he?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You heard Cuno, pighole! NO FUCKIN..."
links.text: "You heard Cuno, pighole! NO FUCKING DIAPER RATS!"

links.title: You: ""I'll write you down as a 'no' then.""
links.text: "I'll write you down as a 'no' then."

links.title: Cuno: ""Write Cuno down as a FUCK YOU, pen..."
links.text: "Write Cuno down as a FUCK YOU, pencil pig."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Shit, pig..." You see respect in h..."
dialogueTree.text: "Shit, pig..." You see respect in his eyes. "You got torn up bad there. Bled like a... like a fucking pig."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno hopes you learned your lesson..."
links.text: "Cuno hopes you learned your lesson and Cuno doesn't have to send his guys after you again." He nods seriously. "Now, what do you want from Cuno?"

links.title: You: ""I am looking for the Children of t..."
links.text: "I am looking for the Children of the Big C. The C stands for Communism. Would that be you?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno isn't a fucking communist, ba..."
links.text: "Cuno isn't a fucking communist, bacon man, he's a fucking *Cunoist.*"

links.title: Rhetoric: "A new mode of government: Rule by C..."
links.text: A new mode of government: Rule by Cuno. Outside of this backyard, it will never exist.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck out of here with your commie..."
links.text: "Fuck out of here with your commie propaganda. There's only Cunoganda in the Kingdom of Cuno."

links.title: You: ""So you respect me now?""
links.text: "So you respect me now?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You're dreamin' pig. That's not ho..."
links.text: "You're dreamin' pig. That's not how this shit *works*."

links.title: Empathy: "A *little*. But don't expect anythi..."
links.text: A *little*. But don't expect anything to *change*.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't let him dominate you, Cuno!..."
links.text: "Don't let him dominate you, Cuno! Fuck his fat ass!"

links.title: You: ""You wouldn't happen to know anythi..."
links.text: "You wouldn't happen to know anything about any missing locusts?"

links.title: You: ""I know you took the locusts from t..."
links.text: "I know you took the locusts from the traps the cryptozoologists set up."

links.title: You: ""Cuno, I need a fridge to stash the..."
links.text: "Cuno, I need a fridge to stash the body."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno cares now.""
links.text: "Cuno cares now."

links.title: You: ""Really Cuno?""
links.text: "Really Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck no, Cuno still doesn't give a..."
links.text: "Fuck no, Cuno still doesn't give a shit."

links.title: You: ""Great, but can I have a quick word?""
links.text: "Great, but can I have a quick word?"

links.title: You: ""I took care of the drug situation.""
links.text: "I took care of the drug situation."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It's not impossible for a boy his s..."
links.text: It's not impossible for a boy his size to climb in...

links.title: You: ""I got more speed. Let's do this ag..."
links.text: "I got more speed. Let's do this again."

links.title: Composure: "The determination in his voice leav..."
links.text: The determination in his voice leaves little room for doubt in his sincerity. He means every word. *Needs* to be taken seriously.

links.title: You: ""You don't threaten me.""
links.text: "You don't threaten me."

links.title: Cuno: ""One word out of you, pigshit, and..."
links.text: "One word out of you, pigshit, and you're locked out of the Cuno experience *forever* -- you hear me?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You hear the Cuno?""
links.text: "You hear the Cuno?"

links.title: Authority: "No! You don't *need* to ever talk t..."
links.text: No! You don't *need* to ever talk to these little shitheads again. It's much more important to prove to this kid you're a man. A *big* man.

links.title: You: "Nod. (You hear him.)"
links.text: Nod. (You hear him.)

links.title: You: ""Try me, you little..." (Seriously..."
links.text: "Try me, you little..." (Seriously risk your relationship with the Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""You and Cuno are fucking done. Get..."
links.text: "You and Cuno are fucking done. Get the fuck out of Cuno's sight."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go, officer. I've had enough..."
links.text: "Let's go, officer. I've had enough of this."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's.""
links.text: "Okay, let's."

links.title: Cuno: ""Aaaaaand you're back in business w..."
links.text: "Aaaaaand you're back in business with the Cuno. Now what is it?"

links.title: Authority: "Cuno is a merciful king. Kind to hi..."
links.text: Cuno is a merciful king. Kind to his wayward subjects.

links.title: You: ""Hey Cuno... got any speed?""
links.text: "Hey Cuno... got any speed?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The man shoots him point blank in h..."
links.text: The man shoots him point blank in his chest. Breathless, the patrol officer collapses in the gutter. His right hand is grabbing the armour on his chest. The bullet didn't pierce it, but he can't breathe. On the pavement, the patter of the perpetrator's feet growing distant.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""Bleed, pig!" someone opens a windo..."
links.text: "Bleed, pig!" someone opens a window and says, but Émile can't see who. His sight grows dim with pain...

links.title: You: ""I'll be there for you, Cuno.""
links.text: "I'll be there for you, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah..." There's a dreamy look in..."
links.text: "Yeah..." There's a dreamy look in his eyes.

links.title: You: ""You know what's a good line of wor..."
links.text: "You know what's a good line of work for getting shot?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Pigs..." He nods. There's a silenc..."
links.text: "Pigs..." He nods. There's a silence. It carries.

links.title: You: ""Don't be silly, you're a kid. Answ..."
links.text: "Don't be silly, you're a kid. Answer me some questions instead."

links.title: Cuno: ""You're such a bummer, pig.""
links.text: "You're such a bummer, pig."

links.title: You: ""I talked to the gardener. She said..."
links.text: "I talked to the gardener. She said not to listen to you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig..." Cuno slaps his forehead. "..."
links.text: "Pig..." Cuno slaps his forehead. "Do you have any idea how fucking stupid that sounds."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno gives you hot fucking leads....."
links.text: "Cuno gives you hot fucking leads... snitch-bitch style -- and you come back griefin' the Cuno? The fuck out of here!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Get the fuck out of here, fatass!..."
links.text: "Get the fuck out of here, fatass! Those pants are too small for you!"

links.title: Composure: "The pants are totally okay, don't l..."
links.text: The pants are totally okay, don't listen to her, she's trying to give you body image problems.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It's totally okay for a man your ag..."
links.text: It's totally okay for a man your age to wear pants like that. And you're not fat.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's cruising his bitch on the t..."
links.text: "Cuno's cruising his bitch on the town and the bitch comes back griefin' to the Cuno? What is up with that?"

links.title: You: ""I talked to Mañana about the armou..."
links.text: "I talked to Mañana about the armour."

links.title: Cuno: ""So?!" He raises his eyebrows, proj..."
links.text: "So?!" He raises his eyebrows, projecting aggressive indifference.

links.title: Suggestion: "You should thank him."
links.text: You should thank him.

links.title: You: ""The body -- what do you know about..."
links.text: "The body -- what do you know about it?"

links.title: You: ""I want to discuss the body with yo..."
links.text: "I want to discuss the body with you again, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's riding it, C." He wipes swe..."
links.text: "Cuno's riding it, C." He wipes sweat from his brow and sends another rock flying.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""The rake, Cuno!""
links.text: "The rake, Cuno!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You should throw the rake at him,..."
links.text: "You should throw the rake at him, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck does Cuno know what a rak..."
links.text: "The fuck does Cuno know what a rake is. Cuno's not a gardener."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Goddamn right, he's not a gardener...."
links.text: Goddamn right, he's not a gardener. He's an athlete. Every rock connects, making the battered corpse look just a little bit worse for wear.

links.title: You: ""About the crime scene -- you kids..."
links.text: "About the crime scene -- you kids often play in this yard?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing. The tip really paid off...."
links.text: "Nothing. The tip really paid off. Good job, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh what?" He quickly looks around...."
links.text: "Uh what?" He quickly looks around. "Don't be playin' Cuno off as a snitch-bitch. The oldest trick in the book, people!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Are you snitching, Cuno?!""
links.text: "Are you snitching, Cuno?!"

links.title: Cuno: ""This is some ancient bullshit, peo..."
links.text: "This is some ancient bullshit, people!" He addresses the surrounding windows. "Cuno would rather take ten than snitch! Pig's full of shit! Get the fuck out of here!"

links.title: Rhetoric: "You found a real nice button to pus..."
links.text: You found a real nice button to push. Turned the tables on him.

links.title: Empathy: "You're a little bit closer now to u..."
links.text: You're a little bit closer now to understanding this kid.

links.title: You: ""He told me you promised to 'sic th..."
links.text: "He told me you promised to 'sic the pigs' on him."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, so?" He doesn't understand...."
links.text: "Yeah, so?" He doesn't understand. "Cuno *did* sic the pigs on him. Cuno's a man of his word."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno sent your fat ass running aro..."
links.text: "Cuno sent your fat ass running around like jello!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Look, pig..." He's suddenly all bu..."
links.text: "Look, pig..." He's suddenly all business. "Cuno sent you to rough some people up. Cuno played you. That happened. Now you and Cuno should move on."

links.title: Volition: "Good idea."
links.text: Good idea.

links.title: You: ""Yes. Let's move on.""
links.text: "Yes. Let's move on."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, that's what Cuno said. Don't..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's what Cuno said. Don't be saying what Cuno said back to Cuno." He throws his hands in the air. "Get the fuck out of here, parroting Cuno..."

links.title: Cuno: ""After this shit you better have so..."
links.text: "After this shit you better have something *real* interesting to say if you wanna stay in Cuno's face."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah! *Real* interesting.""
links.text: "Yeah! *Real* interesting."

links.title: You: ""I will remember this, Cuno.""
links.text: "I will remember this, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""You got fucked." He repeats. "You..."
links.text: "You got fucked." He repeats. "You got fucked, pig. Fucked *bad*. Of course you're gonna remember this. Now get the fuck out of here, griefin' the Cuno..."

links.title: You: ""Whatever, kid...""
links.text: "Whatever, kid..."

links.title: Cuno: ""What is this -- tryin'a be cool wi..."
links.text: "What is this -- tryin'a be cool with your new asshole? Cuno was just being nice to you." He waves you off. "You got fucked bad. Now limp the fuck out of here."

links.title: You: ""He said to thank you. Wasn't too k..."
links.text: "He said to thank you. Wasn't too keen on chasing down that armour anyway."

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh... fuck... okay. Cuno's a giver..."
links.text: "Uh... fuck... okay. Cuno's a giver like that, yes." He looks slightly confused.

links.title: You: ""He said you're now the king of the..."
links.text: "He said you're now the king of the entire *Jamrock*?!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh... North Jamrock," he corrects..."
links.text: "Uh... North Jamrock," he corrects you. "Cuno meant everything north of 8/81. The rooster fucked Cuno's words up. Cuno doesn't do South. Doesn't fuck with the Madre."

links.title: Suggestion: "Cuno appreciates you recognizing hi..."
links.text: Cuno appreciates you recognizing him as the sovereign of Jamrock, though... North Jamrock, that is.

links.title: You: ""I have more questions about the cr..."
links.text: "I have more questions about the crime scene."

links.title: You: ""This all so superficial, kids. The..."
links.text: "This all so superficial, kids. The race mystery runs deeper than you could ever understand."

links.title: Cuno: ""What is this shit?" He shrugs. "Ta..."
links.text: "What is this shit?" He shrugs. "Talk normal to Cuno. You got your fuckbag down."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""The huge kipt made him his bottom..."
links.text: "The huge kipt made him his bottom kipt, Cuno! Stay away from him!"

links.title: You: ""I gotta ask... who is Cuno?""
links.text: "I gotta ask... who is Cuno?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "But he could get in there."
links.text: But he could get in there.

links.title: Cuno: "The kid raises his voice: "But you..."
links.text: The kid raises his voice: "But you and Cuno are good for now. Pals. Shoot that shit at Cuno, let's have a jolly time."

links.title: You: ""Cuno, I found your shack." (Point..."
links.text: "Cuno, I found your shack." (Point to the shack.)

links.title: You: ""Cuno, let's talk about your shack..."
links.text: "Cuno, let's talk about your shack again."

links.title: You: "Try once more to figure him out, fi..."
links.text: Try once more to figure him out, find a way to connect with him.

links.title: You: "Figure out what's going on with thi..."
links.text: Figure out what's going on with this kid.

links.title: You: ""What's that supposed to mean?""
links.text: "What's that supposed to mean?"

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno starts doing the *I got my eye..."
links.text: Cuno starts doing the *I got my eye on you* gesture repeatedly. "Who knows?!"

links.title: You: ""I want to buy the FALN pants after..."
links.text: "I want to buy the FALN pants after all."

links.title: Cuno: ""Here, pig. We FALN now. Performanc..."
links.text: "Here, pig. We FALN now. Performance buddies." Cuno unzips his jacket again and pulls the pants out of the plastic wrapping.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno can already see you soaring t..."
links.text: "Cuno can already see you soaring through the air like a fucking eagle." He looks at you with pride. "Pig's in Cuno's debt now. Money-debt."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Money-debt doesn't mean anything. H..."
links.text: Money-debt doesn't mean anything. He's just saying words. You're not in his debt.

links.title: You: ""I want to buy the FALN pants.""
links.text: "I want to buy the FALN pants."

links.title: You: ""What was that about running you an..."
links.text: "What was that about running you an errand and *illegal narcotics*, Cuno?"

links.title: Authority: "Yeah, maybe you're right... it work..."
links.text: Yeah, maybe you're right... it works better if it's not a kid at the other end of the barrel.

links.title: Volition: "Stop thinking this idiotic thought..."
links.text: Stop thinking this idiotic thought  *now* and say something normal instead.

links.title: You: ""Maybe I do?""
links.text: "Maybe I do?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Why* would you say that?" The lie..."
links.text: "*Why* would you say that?" The lieutenant turns to you, more surprised than angry.

links.title: Cuno: ""Well... uh..." Cuno looks confused..."
links.text: "Well... uh..." Cuno looks confused.

links.title: Authority: "VICTORY!"
links.text: VICTORY!

links.title: You: ""Noooooooo...""
links.text: "Noooooooo..."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's it?! That's all you've got..."
links.text: "That's it?! That's all you've got -- *Noooooo*? Got your ass handed to you by the Cuno?!" He's swaying from side to side like a vicious rooster.

links.title: Cuno: ""Who's the man now, huh? Cuno's the..."
links.text: "Who's the man now, huh? Cuno's the man!" The kid is working himself up. "You wouldn't believe the pussy Cuno tears up."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""What was that, Cuno?""
links.text: "What was that, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Nothing, C, nothing." He coughs. "..."
links.text: "Nothing, C, nothing." He coughs. "Just slicing some bacon."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Cuno: ""What's the matter? Cuno's got you..."
links.text: "What's the matter? Cuno's got you cornered? Nothing to say?" He's swaying from side to side like a vicious rooster.

links.title: You: ""Let's discuss these illegal narcot..."
links.text: "Let's discuss these illegal narcotics again."

links.title: You: ""Cuno, I... I threw up and I can't..."
links.text: "Cuno, I... I threw up and I can't investigate the body now..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, like a fucking volcano!" The..."
links.text: "Yeah, like a fucking volcano!" The kid is mimicking violent puking noises. "Fucking pathetic."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You're lucky you didn't die there,..."
links.text: "You're lucky you didn't die there, f****t!"

links.title: You: ""Maybe you got some advice for me?..."
links.text: "Maybe you got some advice for me? I mean, you are obviously handling it quite well."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno's got some advice for y..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno's got some advice for you." The kid looks to his left, then to his right, and then leans towards you.

links.title: Cuno: ""What are you... like, eighty, righ..."
links.text: "What are you... like, eighty, right? Maybe you should stop embarrassing yourself in front of a fucking kid."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Hmm... perhaps you could compress t..."
links.text: Hmm... perhaps you could compress this negative energy and turn it into some sort of a Cunofied Nonvomitor?

links.title: You: "Uhh... what?"
links.text: Uhh... what?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Don't ask questions, roll with it...."
links.text: Don't ask questions, roll with it. It will work, I promise!

links.title: You: "Cunofied Nonvomitor, here I come!"
links.text: Cunofied Nonvomitor, here I come!

links.title: You: "I don't think so."
links.text: I don't think so.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Always the cynic. Then I have a sug..."
links.text: Always the cynic. Then I have a suggestion -- just don't vomit any more, okay?

links.title: You: ""Screw the both of you!""
links.text: "Screw the both of you!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Or what? You'll fucking vomit on C..."
links.text: "Or what? You'll fucking vomit on Cuno too, pig?"

links.title: You: ""Ah, forget about it.""
links.text: "Ah, forget about it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Wish Cuno could," he says with sad..."
links.text: "Wish Cuno could," he says with sadness in his eyes. "That shit was vile."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'm off." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay, I'm off." [Leave.]

links.title: Cuno: ""Watch out, pig. It's a dangerous w..."
links.text: "Watch out, pig. It's a dangerous world out there. But Cuno's got his eyes on you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't fucking care.""
links.text: "Cuno doesn't fucking care."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Everyone says you started crying i..."
dialogueTree.text: "Everyone says you started crying in the middle of a firefight and then bled like a pig." He shrugs. "I guess that was cool."

links.title: You: ""We're talking again? You're not pi..."
links.text: "We're talking again? You're not pissed off at me?"

links.title: Cuno: ""That was before you took a bullet..."
links.text: "That was before you took a bullet to the *dick*," the kid says. "Now it's back to business with Cuno. Cuno's *adult* like that."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Feels good for some reason."
links.text: Feels good for some reason.

links.title: You: ""Who's saying that?""
links.text: "Who's saying that?"

links.title: Cuno: ""People. They say you kind of *died..."
links.text: "People. They say you kind of *died* for a moment. That you let your shit out already, but then came back. So I guess that's what's cool now."

links.title: Cuno: ""Just don't think coz you got half..."
links.text: "Just don't think coz you got half your dick shot off -- and you're an invalid now -- Cuno's gonna treat you different."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't reward weakness," he..."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't reward weakness," he says looking at your pathetic limp. "It's business as usual with Cuno. Cuno's cold like that."

links.title: You: ""I guess that's true.""
links.text: "I guess that's true."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cool, cool, cool." He nods along...."
links.text: "Cool, cool, cool." He nods along. "That's very cool to Cuno."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: "The kid doesn't even look at you. Y..."
dialogueTree.text: The kid doesn't even look at you. You're dead to him.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno saw you wield that can," he s..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno saw you wield that can," he says with an approving nod. "Sweet graffito action, pig. Cuno likes that delinquent shit."

links.title: You: ""Yeah? You like art, Cuno?""
links.text: "Yeah? You like art, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck no! Art's shit." He takes a s..."
links.text: "Fuck no! Art's shit." He takes a step back.

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah? What about your little Lo..."
links.text: "Oh yeah? What about your little Locust City then?"

links.title: Cuno: ""It's not art, it's fucking brutal...."
links.text: "It's not art, it's fucking brutal. Nothing pussy about it! The fuck out of here!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Even the pigs think it's garbage!""
links.text: "Even the pigs think it's garbage!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Look bitches, Cuno's gonna wrap it..."
links.text: "Look bitches, Cuno's gonna wrap it up for you." He pushes his chin out. "Talk business or fuck off. Enough 'bout this art shit."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""It's still piss-weak garbage!" you..."
links.text: "It's still piss-weak garbage!" you hear a subsonic squeak from behind the fence. "No one likes your fucking art, you should bang with your life. Murder was the case..."

links.title: You: "(Write in an imaginary notebook.) "..."
links.text: (Write in an imaginary notebook.) "Got it: *Art's... shit...."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's right, pig." He looks pleas..."
links.text: "That's right, pig." He looks pleased. "Shit."

links.title: You: ""Easy, Cuno... I just had a couple..."
links.text: "Easy, Cuno... I just had a couple of questions."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shoot that shit at Cuno, piggonaut.""
links.text: "Shoot that shit at Cuno, piggonaut."

links.title: You: ""Poppa's bad to the bone, Cuno. Rot..."
links.text: "Poppa's bad to the bone, Cuno. Rotten to the core."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's pa is. You're just shit at..."
links.text: "Cuno's pa is. You're just shit at life," he says without malice. "Now what's your case with Cuno?"

links.title: You: ""Thank you, Cuno. I really apprecia..."
links.text: "Thank you, Cuno. I really appreciate it."

links.title: Cuno: ""You're still a dink," he says with..."
links.text: "You're still a dink," he says without malice. "Now what's your case with Cuno?"

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Necromancer pig," he says, eyes fu..."
dialogueTree.text: "Necromancer pig," he says, eyes full of admiration. "That shit was dark... going in there like that... brutal shit. Tell me:"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno dies, you're gonna pick one o..."
links.text: "Cuno dies, you're gonna pick one out of his brain like that too? Cuno's gonna go out in a hail of bullets. Gonna look like a fucking porcupine."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Porta Rosa, a side alley of the Boo..."
links.text: Porta Rosa, a side alley of the Boogie Street spearhead. A young man in his early twenties approaches Patrol Officer Émile Mollins and asks for a cigarette. As Officer Mollins reaches in his coat pocket for the pack of 'Astra' he just purchased this morning...

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""So you tried to kill Cuno's girl....."
dialogueTree.text: "So you tried to kill Cuno's girl... What's up with that? You wanna talk about it?"

links.title: Drama: "Sire, it just *went off*!"
links.text: Sire, it just *went off*!

links.title: You: ""Cuno, I wasn't trying to shoot her..."
links.text: "Cuno, I wasn't trying to shoot her. It just went off. Sometimes it just goes off..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno wants to like reckless shit....."
links.text: "Cuno wants to like reckless shit..." He looks at one hand, then the other. "But then you almost kill Cuno's girl. Cuno's conflicted and shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""Stop bending Cuno's mind and stop..."
links.text: "Stop bending Cuno's mind and stop waving your gun around kids. What the fuck is wrong with you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
links.text: The lieutenant nods.

links.title: Cuno: ""Whatcha fuckin' noddin' at there,..."
links.text: "Whatcha fuckin' noddin' at there, 'clard?! Cuno sees that shit." He makes a discarding motion. "Let's just talk shit, Cuno needs to calm down."

links.title: Empathy: "He means it. He really does want to..."
links.text: He means it. He really does want to calm down.

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay. The fuck do you want from Cu..."
links.text: "Okay. The fuck do you want from Cuno?"

links.title: You: "Nod."
links.text: Nod.

links.title: You: ""But I didn't try to shoot her, I j..."
links.text: "But I didn't try to shoot her, I just aimed at her."

links.title: Cuno: ""What, bitch?! You fuckin' making E..."
links.text: "What, bitch?! You fuckin' making EXCUSES for yourself now?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." An imperceptible nod."
links.text: "Hmh..." An imperceptible nod.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You *are* making excuses, he thinks..."
links.text: You *are* making excuses, he thinks. For aiming your gun at a child nonetheless.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry about that, I got carrie..."
links.text: "I'm sorry about that, I got carried away."

links.title: Cuno: ""Do this shit again and Cuno's gonn..."
links.text: "Do this shit again and Cuno's gonna climb in your room at night -- with a knife." He points towards the Whirling-in-Rags and whispers:

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows where you sleep -- the..."
links.text: "Cuno knows where you sleep -- the pig who fucked his window up. I'm gonna climb in through that balcony, put the fucking knife in you... yeah," he mouths: "I've been in your room."

links.title: Drama: "Sire, the boy has *not* really been..."
links.text: Sire, the boy has *not* really been in thine room. 'Tis but a falsification.

links.title: Volition: "He hasn't been in your room, relax."
links.text: He hasn't been in your room, relax.

links.title: You: ""I think we've all moved past that..."
links.text: "I think we've all moved past that by now, Cuno."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not *all* of us." The lieutenant s..."
links.text: "Not *all* of us." The lieutenant shakes his head. "Acts like that stick with you for a while."

links.title: Cuno: ""No one's moving anywhere. Do this..."
links.text: "No one's moving anywhere. Do this shit again and Cuno's gonna climb in your room at night -- with a knife." He points towards the Whirling-in-Rags and whispers:

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""You missed a good show before. A *..."
dialogueTree.text: "You missed a good show before. A *kipt* came by and completely fucked the tree to pieces."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He *fucked* the tree up! Fucked it..."
links.text: "He *fucked* the tree up! Fucked it good! It was porno."

links.title: You: ""Stop using *the k-word!* It belong..."
links.text: "Stop using *the k-word!* It belongs in the past."

links.title: Cuno: ""Can't tell Cuno what words to use...."
links.text: "Can't tell Cuno what words to use. Fucking *kipt*." He imbues the last syllable with a special kind of joy.

links.title: You: ""Hmmm... looks like it does have a..."
links.text: "Hmmm... looks like it does have a place in the future after all."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, kipt's a cool word. Cool men..."
links.text: "Yeah, kipt's a cool word. Cool men say kipt. Cuno's dad says it all the time, they say kipt on the radio. Cops say kipt. Even kipts say kipt. Cuno's cool. Cuno's a kipt."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Kipt-Cuno!""
links.text: "Kipt-Cuno!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Now lay that shit at Cuno." He sna..."
links.text: "Now lay that shit at Cuno." He snaps his fingers. "You got your fuck bag down from the tree, fuck more do you want?"

links.title: You: ""What is this, a word museum? You w..."
links.text: "What is this, a word museum? You wanna belong to a museum, Cuno? With the old people?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck you, Cuno says *kipt* if he w..."
links.text: "Fuck you, Cuno says *kipt* if he wants to. Cuno's dad says *kipt* all the time. *Kipt's* a cool word."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Kipt, kipt, kiptidy kipty kipt..."..."
links.text: "Kipt, kipt, kiptidy kipty kipt..." The little one sputters, "kiptidy kipt kipt kipt kipt..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's like a little engine has come..."
links.text: It's like a little engine has come alive on the other side of the fence. An engine that only says *kipt*.

links.title: Cuno: ""... kipt kipt kipt." He comes to a..."
links.text: "... kipt kipt kipt." He comes to an abrupt stop. "Alright, shut it down, C, the Cunn has business to do." He turns to you, victorious.

links.title: You: ""Total *retards* use language like..."
links.text: "Total *retards* use language like that. Congratulations, Cuno, you just made yourself a retard."

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh...""
Cunoesse: ""Stop choking, Cuno! The *fägäri's*..."
links.text: "Stop choking, Cuno! The *fägäri's* got you in a chokehold!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Kh...ff... Cuno's not fucking chok..."
links.text: "Kh...ff... Cuno's not fucking choking." He grabs his throat like he's choking.

links.title: You: ""Choked you out there. Serves you r..."
links.text: "Choked you out there. Serves you right for using reactionary shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""Like fuck you did..." He lets go o..."
links.text: "Like fuck you did..." He lets go of his throat. "Cuno's gonna keep saying kipt forever now. Kipt, kipt, kih.. *cough*." He only gets two kipts out before he coughs.

links.title: Half Light: "You really fucked him."
links.text: You really fucked him.

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit..." He stops. "The fuck did y..."
links.text: "Shit..." He stops. "The fuck did you want anyway? You got your fuckbag down, now let's talk normal shit."

links.title: You: ""Alright alright, simmer down. I th..."
links.text: "Alright alright, simmer down. I think we all learned our lesson."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's back to full power now, he..."
links.text: "Cuno's back to full power now, he doesn't give a shit about kipts and retards." He lets go of his throat. "Let's talk normal shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck did you want anyway, you got..."
links.text: "Fuck did you want anyway, you got your fuckbag down?"

links.title: You: ""Oh, now you want a normal conversa..."
links.text: "Oh, now you want a normal conversation, huh?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yes, yes, Cuno wants a normal conv..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, Cuno wants a normal conversation!" He even sounds a little plaintive now. "Ask normal shit please."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, let's have normal conversati..."
links.text: "Yeah, let's have normal conversation."

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah, kids!" (Nod in approval.)..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, kids!" (Nod in approval.) "But don't you mean *desert kipt*?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Watch out, Cuno! He's trying to cr..."
links.text: "Watch out, Cuno! He's trying to crawl up your ass!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows which kipt Cuno meant...."
links.text: "Cuno knows which kipt Cuno meant. Cuno knows *all* the kipts. Cuno's dad's a kipt-expert, says kipt every day! A hundred times a day!!"

links.title: Cuno: "He boasts: "Cuno's dad doesn't give..."
links.text: He boasts: "Cuno's dad doesn't give a shit about *anything*."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Except kipts."
links.text: Except kipts.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Try to crawl out of Cuno's ass now!""
links.text: "Try to crawl out of Cuno's ass now!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, the fuck did you want anyway..."
links.text: "Yeah, the fuck did you want anyway? You got your fuckbag down."

links.title: You: ""Wish I could have been here to see..."
links.text: "Wish I could have been here to see it... Now, I have some questions."

links.title: Rhetoric: "If you want to shut it down, you ne..."
links.text: If you want to shut it down, you need to act decisively. It's Cuno. Use Cuno-words.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "By the way, 'kipt' is a racial slur..."
links.text: By the way, 'kipt' is a racial slur.

dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "That's right, turn your weaknesses..."
dialogueTree.text: That's right, turn your weaknesses into conceptual strengths. Try it again now.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's like Cuno's dad -- Cuno doe..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno's like Cuno's dad -- Cuno doesn't give a fuck about anything."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Fuck does Cuno care?" The boy turn..."
dialogueTree.text: "Fuck does Cuno care?" The boy turns to you. (He doesn't care.)

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Can't you see I'm throwing rocks?!""
Cuno: ""Cuno's got this." The boy throwing..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno's got this." The boy throwing rocks at the dead body can't be older than twelve.

links.title: Conceptualization: "If there ever was such a thing as a..."
links.text: If there ever was such a thing as an ugly kid, then this is it. He's almost exquisite in his ugliness. Like a gremlin.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Oh yeah, *napakymppi* Cuno!" yells..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, *napakymppi* Cuno!" yells the other kid behind the fence.

links.title: You: ""Hey kid, a word. Police business.""
links.text: "Hey kid, a word. Police business."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Right in the dick, Cuno! Get him r..."
links.text: "Right in the dick, Cuno! Get him right in the dick!" The children ignore you.

links.title: Cuno: ""F****ts love it in the dick.""
links.text: "F****ts love it in the dick."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The boy is sweating profusely, his..."
links.text: The boy is sweating profusely, his eyes are like two black holes and his jaw is twitching as if trying to break free from the empire of his body.

links.title: You: "Hold on, what does that mean?"
links.text: Hold on, what does that mean?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The kid is obviously high."
links.text: The kid is obviously high.

links.title: You: ""Stop throwing rocks at my crime sc..."
links.text: "Stop throwing rocks at my crime scene!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fuck that f****t up, Cuno. Yeah! R..."
links.text: "Fuck that f****t up, Cuno. Yeah! Right in the mouth-hole!"

links.title: Authority: "They pay you no heed or pretend not..."
links.text: They pay you no heed or pretend not to notice you.

links.title: Cuno: ""F****t shit himself.""
links.text: "F****t shit himself."

links.title: You: ""Stop using slurs at my crime scene..."
links.text: "Stop using slurs at my crime scene. That's not how we do it."

links.title: You: ""A moment of your time, please!""
links.text: "A moment of your time, please!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Can't talk, pig. Shit's coming up..."
links.text: "Can't talk, pig. Shit's coming up strong. Throwing rocks."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Shit coming up strong... that sound..."
links.text: Shit coming up strong... that sounds good. Joyous. You should hang out with this kid and see what that juicy *shit* is all about.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, Cuno! Ride the lightning, Cu..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno! Ride the lightning, Cuno!"

links.title: You: "Juicy what now?"
links.text: Juicy what now?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "I mean drugs. The kid's on drugs."
links.text: I mean drugs. The kid's on drugs.

links.title: You: "Never mind."
links.text: Never mind.

links.title: You: ""I'm not getting into this right no..."
links.text: "I'm not getting into this right now." [Leave.]
